assignments.title: Name and description
assignments.content:
Scrum Masters, submit the product type, the product name, and the product description.

You can delegate this submission to any team member.

For instructions regarding the submission, please see the page Expo: Instructions for Teams

assignments.title: Product image or icon
assignments.content:
Scrum Masters, submit an image file showing the product.

You can delegate this submission to any team member.

For instructions regarding the image, please see the page Expo: Instructions for Teams

assignments.title: Link to expo-page for the team
assignments.content:
Scrum Masters, please submit the link to the specific web page your team will use to present the product on the online exhibition.

You can delegate this submission to any team member.

For instructions regarding the expo-page, please see the page Expo: Instructions for Teams

assignments.title: Product poster
assignments.content:
Scrum Masters, submit a poster for the product.

You can delegate this submission to any team member.

For instructions regarding the image, please see the page Expo: Instructions for Teams.

assignments.title: Attendance during sprints
assignments.content: Teachers use this assignment to keep track of your attendance during the project weeks.

assignments.title: 1. Beginning with Scrum
assignments.content:
Answer all questions in the best way you can.

Sometimes, an answer can be more or less correct, but this kind of quiz is too simple to handle that. So if you don't get it right, please have a look at the comments and try again. Discuss your choices with your team, and with the teachers.

You need at least 7 points (out of 8) to pass this quiz.

assignments.title: 2. Sprint planning
assignments.content:
Scenario: You and your team are having your first sprint planning meeting. You are presented with some good or bad choices. Try to select the good choices, of course!

Sometimes, an answer can be more or less correct, but this kind of quiz is too simple to handle that. So if you don't get it right, please have a look at the comments and try again. Discuss your choices with your team, and with the teachers.

You need at least 7 points (out of 8) to pass this quiz.

assignments.title: 3. The sprint
assignments.content:
Scenario: You and your team are running your first sprint. You are presented with some good and bad choices. Try to select the good choices, of course!

Sometimes, an answer can be more or less correct, but this kind of quiz is too simple to handle that. So if you don't get it right, please have a look at the comments and try again. Discuss your choices with your team, and with the teachers.

You need at least 7 points (out of 8) to pass this quiz.
